pkgmetadata.longdescription: canossa invisible screen engine===============================Install-------via github :: $ git clone --recursive https://github.com/saitoha/canossa.git $ cd canossa $ python setup.py installor via pip :: $ pip install canossaLicense-------MIT licenseDependencies------------ - termprop https://github.com/saitoha/termprop - TFF - Terminal Filter Framework https://github.com/saitoha/tffDependents---------- - sentimental-skk https://github.com/saitoha/sentimental-skk
